meanings.definition: In a fearless or determined manner.
meanings.sent1: She undauntedly faced her fears and climbed the tall tree.
meanings.sent2: He undauntedly pursued his dreams despite the challenges.
meanings.sent3: The little mouse undauntedly stood up to the big cat in a game of chess.
meanings.sent4: The sun rose undauntedly each morning, ready to light up the world.
meanings.sent5: The firefighter undauntedly rushed into the burning building to save the trapped family.

meanings.sent1: She undauntedly continued her research even after facing setbacks.
meanings.sent2: The team undauntedly faced their opponents in the final match.
meanings.sent3: The clown undauntedly tried to juggle while riding a unicycle.
meanings.sent4: The river undauntedly flowed through the rocky terrain, carving its path.
meanings.sent5: The student undauntedly raised her hand to ask a question in class.
